question: Two chemicals react in a beaker that has water droplets on the outside of the bottom of the beaker. The water droplets freeze. Which statement best describes the reaction?
candidate_answers: (A) Endothermic because energy is absorbed. (B) Endothermic because energy is released. (C) Exothermic because energy is absorbed. (D) Exothermic because energy is released.
label: C
